programme.desc: Alison and Donovan take their chances on a split-level home that is full of disasters. Faced with numerous setbacks, they must put their differences aside to turn the nightmare into a dream home for potential buyers.

programme.desc: A tip from a friend lands Alison and Donovan one of the first landmarked cottages in the Ukrainian Village of Chicago. They hope to restore it to its former glory, but strict historical build guidelines and expensive property loss hamper plans.

programme.desc: A couple bought a karate studio as an investment property but when life threw them a curveball, they decided to downsize. With Dave and Jenny's help, they want to transform the commercial space into a home complete with industrial and modern charm.

programme.title: Fixer to Fabulous

programme.title: Cheap Eats

programme.title: Cheap Eats

programme.title: Bizarre Foods: Delicious Destinations

programme.title: Bizarre Foods: Delicious Destinations

programme.title: Yum and Yummer
programme.desc: Eddie Jackson goes hog-wild all day with dishes that use every single part of the pig. Simple strips of bacon for breakfast just won't do, and forget about basic barbecue. These are the perfect porky portions for an entire day of pigging out.

programme.title: Yum and Yummer

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Jarrod and Brandi bring their kids to the auction during spring break. Meanwhile, Ivy hopes to stock up for his upcoming store auction and Darrel puts his 'Gambler' nickname to the ultimate test.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Jarrod and Brandi are all about having fun as they try to dunk the competition. Darrell and Brandon hope to be on par with a victory, while Casey tries her hand at bidding. Ivy transforms his store into an auction house.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The buyers head to El Monte, California, where they take the local competition head-on. Darrell and Brandon score some antique loot, while Jarrod and Brandi get a rocking good locker. Ivy hits a score that may just lead to the mother lode.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The buyers have a surprise visitor from the Lone Star state at an auction in Upland, CA. Jarrod and Brandi are determined to make big money from small finds.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Dan and Laura Dotson find themselves in a life or death crisis. Unaware, the buyers get down to business in Hemet, CA.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The buyers are back in Moreno Valley, CA where Darrell and Brandon discover the sweet taste of success.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: At an auction in Montclair, Ivy rakes in the dollar bills, while Darrell keeps things old school and finds something that will launch him to new heights. Also, Brandi worries Jarrod's hangover will get in the way of buying, and Dave just won't stay away.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Everyone is shocked to see Dave Hester return to the auctions with a vengeance, but even the Mogul can't stop the buyers from scoring great units in Huntington Beach. Also, Darrell tries to get Brandon in 'tip-top' shape, and Ivy must change up his game.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Jarrod and Brandi are determined not to let Dave distract them from a good score, while Darrell wants to find out more about the elusive Mogul. Dave shows up with even more bluster, and Ivy uncovers a treasure that promises adventure on the high seas.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Darrell and Brandon are excited to return to West Covina as it is a hidden honeypot for the duo. While it's off the beaten path, Jarrod and Brandi decide to follow Darrell's lead into the Inland Empire. Plus, Ivy searches for low level merchandise.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Dan Dotson returns to the auctions in Costa Mesa, where the buyers have their sights set on Dave Hester's home turf. Darrell and Brandon take the auction over the top. Jarrod and Brandi make a discovery that takes them where no bidder has gone before.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The buyers head to the hills of Murietta for an auction that has tensions and prices running high. Dave angers Darrell so much that it leads to the Gambler doing something drastic. Ivy uses brains over brawn to score a locker.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The buyers welcome Rene and Casey back to the auctions with a healthy dose of badgering and competition. Dave heats things up and finds a piece of board game history. Darrell and Brandon show their moves outside of the auctions.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Darrell and Brandon return to the site of their biggest score while the other buyers are focused on taking down the self-proclaimed 'King of Montebello.' Jarrod and Brandi land a locker that leads them to something called a 'Herbmeister.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The buyers head south to Oceanside, CA, which is Rene's backyard and he intends to make the competition pay for coming to his territory. Jarrod and Brandi discover that friendship can be magic and profitable.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: An auction in El Monte, CA has big lockers which means big money. Dave nabs a unit that shows he knows how to party and Rene tries to slice a bit of profit from a chilling find.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The buyers throw down in Koreatown. Dave expects to score some high-end merchandise, while Darrell struggles as he's never been to this area before. Mary fights for her lockers, and Jarrod may just push Brandi over the edge.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: An auction in San Marcos brings Darrell and Brandon to their home turf and Mary finds a way to deal with inflated prices.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The competition becomes fierce in North Hollywood and even Dan and Laura can't escape the tension. Dave scores a locker that may be a hit and Rene fights past the local buyers to have some fun.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The buyers hit a vault auction in Huntington Beach where Dave decides to bring a few friends to help him out. Mary struggles to win a vault and keep her inexperience under wraps.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: An auction in Mission Hills brings new challenges as Ivy changes his game and goes for a locker with collectables. Mary just tries to land something that will give her a quick sale.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The buyers head out to Palm Springs for an auction that brings sweet lockers and big money finds. Mary is worried that they area may be too high society for her, while Ivy sets his sights on vintage items.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Dave finds something that has him baffled while Ivy attempts an elusive strategy to make a score.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The buyers head to Santa Ana, CA where dreams of great lockers spice up the auction. Jarrod and Brandi get a locker that leads to the sweet life while Mary tries to get something more collectable.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The auctions begin in Upland, California, but Dan and Laura take the buyers on a wild ride to finish out the day. Ivy ends up with an eyeful, and Mary buys early in hopes of treasure.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Fontana, CA becomes FUNtana as Dave explores his lighter side and Mary tries to put a little 'Texas' into the auction.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Dan and Laura take the buyers back to Torrance for an auction that has them battling for the best unit of the day. Ivy changes up his game to stunning results, Brandi puts Jarrod on a harsh budget and Dave takes on Rene against every locker.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Bellflower, CA hosts an auction that has high stakes and big money finds. Ivy struggles through a bad buy to find something of value, while Dave tries to find trash among the treasure. Jarrod buys a unit that becomes a horror show for Brandi.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Ivy is excited to return to an area known for the items he needs, but Jarrod and Brandi must employ sharp strategy to get a good locker. Darrel and Brandon are looking to score heavy which puts Mary at the bottom hoping for a top unit.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Darrell tries to smoke the competition and proves that sometimes treasure can look like trash. Mary struggles to wrangle information from the more experienced buyers, but Rene is not looking to share first place in the hunt for the best locker.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Jarrod and Brandi find a very unusual piece of art that might leave them flush(ing). Rene and Casey enjoy a little vino.

programme.desc: Brandi does her best to stay positive for Jarrod, while Dave is out for blood.
